projects.title: TB Epidemiological Risk Assessment
projects.description: Built case-control assignment algorithm utilizing clinical, behavioral, and self-report data from over 50 variables. Implemented Random Forest and Logistic Regression models to predict active tuberculosis progression in 1000+ patients from rural South African clinics.

projects.title: TB scRNA-seq Immunogenetic Analysis
projects.description: Leading the first-ever single-cell RNA sequencing analysis of a TB case-control cohort using 10X Genomics. Profiling gene expression and cell surface protein markers in PBMCs to identify novel genetic variants and immune mechanisms driving TB progression.

projects.title: CAAPA Pathogenic Variant Annotation
projects.description: Applying variant effect prediction algorithms to a global genetic dataset of 3000+ individuals from 60 populations. Created consensus ML metric for classifying deleterious genetic variants and identified correlations with evolutionary conservation tools.
